mapper.select: select count(*) from chart where regdate like #{keyword} and name=#{name}
select * from chart where regdate like #{keyword} and name=#{name} order by regdate
select max(avgprice) from chart where regdate like #{keyword} and name=#{name}
select count(*) from allproduct where cate1=#{cate1} and cate2=#{cate2} and cate3=#{cate3} and grade>1

SELECT ap.*, pc.catename, pc.amount, pc.unit FROM allproduct ap JOIN productcategory pc ON ap.cate1 = pc.cate1 AND ap.cate2 = pc.cate2 AND ap.cate3 = pc.cate3 WHERE ap.cate1 = #{cate1} and ap.cate2 = #{cate2} and ap.cate3 = #{cate3} AND ap.grade > 1 order by ap.avgprice
select * from chart where name = #{catename} order by regdate desc
